name: 4 In 1 Super CD
summary: This compilation disc was packed in with the TurboDuo in North America, giving buyers easy access to Bonk's Adventure, Bonk's Revenge, Bomberman, and Gate of Thunder. Despite appearing to contain only three games, Bomberman can be accessed by pressing Up, Right, Down, Left, II at the game select menu.

name: 4 in 1 Row
summary: Connect 4 ring any bells, it should do, this game is a variation on the paper/pen classic 0X0 also, all you have to do to beat your opponent is simply out manoeuvre them in a strategy game of getting 4 of your colours in one row while blocking your opponent from doing the same.

name: 4 in 1: Irem
summary: Four Irem games on a single cartridge.

name: 4 in 1: Tomy
summary: Four Tomy games on a single cartridge for Game Boy.

name: 4-in-1 Fun Pak
summary: 4-in-1 Fun Pak is a compilation of board games that includes four different classic board games: chess, reversi, checkers, and backgammon.

name: 4in1: Bomb Disposer/Armour Force/Black Forest Tale/2nd Space
summary: A collection of four Sachen games previously available on Mega Duck and individual Game Boy cartridges.

name: 4 in 1
summary: A collection of 4 games for Supervision.

name: 4 in 1
summary: Four games for Gamate on on cartridge.

name: 4-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle
summary: We transform science into delightful gamesFor decades, researchers have created tasks that measure cognitive abilities. Weâ€™ve adapted some of these tasks and made some of our own, creating cognitive games. It makes you smarter!

name: 4-in-1 Funpak Volume II
summary:
Now get four times the fun from your Gameboy system with 4-in-1 Funpak, Vol. II. If you like Yahtzee, you'll love Yacht. Cut the cards for hours of fun with Solitaire. Peg your spot in the winner's circle with Cribbage. Or build on your skills with Dominoes.
You can take these all-time favorite games with you anywhere, anytime. It's like having cards, dic and dominoes in the palm of your hand. So come on, get ready to shake, shuffle, and roll your way to hours of fun!

name: 4-in-1 Version 1
summary: 4-in-1 Version 1 was the first volume of 4-in-1 multicarts made by Sachen. It contains: Street Rider, Vex Block, Trap & Turn, and Duck Adventures.

name: 4-in-1 Version 2
summary: 4-in-1 Version 2 was the second volume of 4-in-1 multicarts made by Sachen. It contains: Virus Attack, Electron World, Dice Square, and Trouble Zone.

name: 4-in-1 Version 3
summary: 4-in-1 Version 3, also known as Commin 4-in-1, was the third volume of 4-in-1 multicarts made by Sachen. It contains: Taiwan's Mahjong, Japan's Mahjong, Hong Kong's Mahjung, and Store Tris 2.

name: 4-in-1 Version 4
summary: 4-in-1 Version 4 was the fourth volume of 4-in-1 multicarts made by Sachen. It contains: Pile Wonder, Snake Roy, Suleiman's Treasure, and Puppet Knight.

name: 4-in-1 Version 9
summary: 4-in-1 Version 9 was the ninth volume of 4-in-1 multicarts made by Sachen. It contains: Zipball, Small Gorilla, Crazy Burger, and Deep: Final Mission.

name: 4Islands
summary: Once on the island, you will need to solve the riddle - who you are and why you are on these islands. Exploring the area you will need to engage in crafting, construction, hunting and survival. A lot of interesting mechanics and a mysterious plot.

name: 4 in 1 Vol.17
summary: 4 in 1 Vol.17 is a game bundle for the Timetop GameKing. The bundle includes the games Terminator, Nagual. Black Jack and Revenger

name: 4 in One: Cave Wonders/Earth Defender/Jaguar Bomber/Soccer Champion
4ife
summary: You have to overcome the challenging tasks you have to do in order to return from the parallel universe you are sent to to your own universe. But remember this: Returning home will not be as easy as you think. Find the portals and collect ancient coins.

name: 4 In a Blow
summary: 4 In a Blow is the classic 4 in a row made for casual and puzzle gamers. Unlock items that can help you make 4 in a row. Use dynamite, buy extra bombs, use the torch and air canister. Do everything to make 4 in a row.

name: 4 In a Row:Deluxe
summary:
You can get so much fun from 4 in a Row - Deluxe!
4 in a Row is a two-player game and the object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before your opponent. 3 AI levels of gameplay against the computer, or against your friend on same or different devices! This strategy board game let you keep having fun as well as improve your levels.

name: 4 in 1: Meine Tierarztpraxis + Meine Tierpension + Mein Gestuet + Mein Pferd
4 in 1: Nintendo
summary:
A licensed compilation of 4 Nintendo Game Boy titles in a single cartridge, distributed by Mani Ltd.

Games included:
- Tetris
- Tennis
- Alleyway
- Yakuman

name: 4 in 1: Hudson
summary:
A licensed compilation of 4 Hudson Soft Game Boy titles in a single cartridge, distributed by Mani Ltd.

Games included:

- Adventure Island II: Aliens in Paradise

- Milon's Secret Castle

- Bonk's Adventure

- Atomic Punk

name: 4 in a Row
summary: Everybody knows it, everybody loves it!

name: 4-in-1 Award Winning Indie Gems
summary: Get 4 award-winning games and enjoy capturing stories of joy and heartbreak.

name: 4-in-1 Adventure Bundle
summary: Get 4 adventures and experience exciting stories, heartbreak, and pure fun!

name: 4 in 1 Bundle
summary: Have fun with this 4-pack of incredible games.

name: 4 in 1 Bundle Creative Puzzles & Table Football
summary: 4 in 1 Bundle!!! Discover the exciting fusion of creative puzzles and the classic table football game!

name: 4 in 1 Sports Bundle
summary: Enjoy 4 games in 1 with this irresistible games pack!

name: 4 in 1 Sports Bundle Vol. 2
summary: Enjoy 4 games in 1 with this irresistible games pack!
